titleStmt.title: William S. Botts et al. to James F. Robinson
CWG7746

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
To his Excellency Gov. Roberson
Sir

We would respectfully recommend David Wilson of the County of Fleming as Suitable person for the office of Notary Publick made vacant the acceptance of Thos B Smith of the office of Elected State Commissioner. Mr Wilson is of the Banking house of Smith Wilson & Co

Wm S. Botts
Jno B. Herston
H. Taylor
Josh Barnes
Thos. Lowman
W C. Ireland
